query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
1 Già si godeva solo del suo verbo 2 quello specchio beato, e io gustava 3 lo mio, temprando col dolce l’acerbo;
query.error: **English:** 1 Already he enjoyed his word alone, 2 that blessed mirror, and I savored 3 mine, tempering the bitter with the sweet;

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
4 e quella donna ch’a Dio mi menava 5 disse: «Muta pensier; pensa ch’i’ sono 6 presso a colui ch’ogne torto disgrava».
query.error: **English:** 4 and that lady who was leading me to God 5 said: "Change your thought; think that I am 6 near to him who relieves every wrong."
query.result: 4 sā ca strī yaḥ māṃ devebhyaḥ prāpayati sma, 5 uvāca: "Cittaṃ vikuruta; manyadhvam ahaṃ asmi, 6 tasya समीपे 'smi yaḥ sarvaṃ vikṛtiṃ vināśayati."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
7 Io mi rivolsi a l’amoroso suono 8 del mio conforto; e qual io allor vidi 9 ne li occhi santi amor, qui l’abbandono:
query.error: **English:** 7 I turned to the loving sound 8 of my comfort; and what I saw then 9 in those holy eyes, love, I abandon here:
query.result: 7 Aham ātmānam āvartayām āśvāsanasyānugrahasya ca śabdam prati, 8 mama āśvāsanam ca yathā aham tadā apaśyam 9 netra-dvaye pavitre premā, tatraiva tyajāmi:

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
10 non perch’ io pur del mio parlar diffidi, 11 ma per la mente che non può redire 12 sovra sé tanto, s’altri non la guidi.
query.error: **English:** 10 not because I doubt my own speech, 11 but because the mind cannot return 12 to itself so far, unless another guides it.
query.result: 10 na tasmāt mama svakīyavacanāt viśvāsam nāsti, 11 api tu manasaḥ, yat svayam eva punar āgacchatum na śaknoti 12 ātmānam prati tāvat, yadi anyaḥ na nayati.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
13 Tanto poss’ io di quel punto ridire, 14 che, rimirando lei, lo mio affetto 15 libero fu da ogne altro disire,
query.error: **English:** 13 So much can I say of that moment, 14 that, looking at her, my affection 15 was freed from every other desire,
query.result: 13 Tatasya kālasya tāvad eva vaktuṃ śaknomi, 14 yataḥ tāṃ dṛṣṭvā mama snehaḥ 15 sarvebhyaḥ anyebhyaḥ kāmebhyaḥ nirmuktaḥ abhūt,

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
16 fin che ’l piacere etterno, che diretto 17 raggiava in Bëatrice, dal bel viso 18 mi contentava col secondo aspetto.
query.error: **English:** 16 until the eternal pleasure, which directly 17 radiates in Beatrice, from her beautiful face 18 contented me with the second aspect.
query.result: 16 yāvat kālaṃ nityānandaḥ, yaḥ pratyakṣaḥ 17 prakāśate Bēatrice-mukhe, sundare 18 mayā dvitīyena rūpeṇa santuṣṭaḥ.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
19 Vincendo me col lume d’un sorriso, 20 ella mi disse: «Volgiti e ascolta; 21 ché non pur ne’ miei occhi è paradiso».
query.error: **English:** 19 Conquering me with the light of a smile, 20 she said to me: "Turn and listen; 21 for not only in my eyes is paradise."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.

query.result: 22 Yathā ihāpi kadācit 23 dṛṣṭau ratiḥ, yadi sātivratī, 24 yatas tayā sarvātmā hṛtā,

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
31 spiriti son beati, che giù, prima 32 che venissero al ciel, fuor di gran voce, 33 sì ch’ogne musa ne sarebbe opima.
query.error: **English:** 31 are blessed spirits, who down below, before 32 they came to heaven, were of such great renown, 33 that every muse would be enriched by them.
query.result: 31 ātmānaḥ santi subhāgāḥ, ye adhastāt, pūrvam 32 svargam āgacchanti sma, atiśayitaśabdena, 33 yathā sarvāḥ api devatāḥ taiḥ puṣyeta."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
34 Però mira ne’ corni de la croce: 35 quello ch’io nomerò, lì farà l’atto 36 che fa in nube il suo foco veloce».
query.error: **English:** 34 But look at the horns of the cross: 35 the one I will name will do there the act 36 that his swift lightning does in the clouds.
query.result: 34 Tathāpi paśya kṛṣṇavarṇasya śūlasya śṛṅgeṣu: 35 yam aham nāma grahīṣyāmi, sa tatra tad vidhānam kariṣyati 36 yathā megheṣu vidyut svīyam tejas tatkālam prakāśayati.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
37 Io vidi per la croce un lume tratto 38 dal nomar Iosuè, com’ el si feo; 39 né mi fu noto il dir prima che ’l fatto.
query.error: **English:** 37 I saw a light drawn to the cross 38 by the name of Jesus, as he made himself known; 39 and I was not aware of the name before the deed.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
40 E al nome de l’alto Macabeo 41 vidi moversi un altro roteando, 42 e letizia era ferza del paleo.
query.error: **English:** 40 And in the name of the noble Maccabee 41 I saw another one moving, whirling around, 42 and joy was the goad of his top.
query.result: 40 Evaṃ ca uttama-makabī-nāmadheye 41 Aparamapi cakram āvartataḥ apaśyam, 42 Ānandena ca tasya bhramaṇam āśu.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
43 Così per Carlo Magno e per Orlando 44 due ne seguì lo mio attento sguardo, 45 com’ occhio segue suo falcon volando.
query.error: **English:** 43 Thus for Charlemagne and for Orlando 44 my attentive gaze followed two of them, 45 as an eye follows its falcon flying.
query.result: 43 Evam Kārlomāgnaṃ ca auraṇḍam ca 44 dvau anvagacchat mama akṣiṇīkṣaṇaṃ, 45 yathākṣiṇī śakunaṃ patantam anveti.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.

query.result: 46 Tataḥ Guilyelmaṃ ca Rainoardaṃ ca 47 Gottifrediṃ ca dukameva me cakṣuḥ ākarṣat 48 tasmin kruce, Rubertaṃ ca Guiscardaṃ ca.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
49 Indi, tra l’altre luci mota e mista, 50 mostrommi l’alma che m’avea parlato 51 qual era tra i cantor del cielo artista.
query.error: **English:** 49 Then, among the other lights moving and mingled, 50 the soul who had spoken to me showed me 51 who he was among the heavenly singers.
query.result: 49 Tataḥ, anyeṣu prakāśeṣu calatsu miśreṣu ca, 50 ātmā yaḥ mama sākam abhāṣata, sa adarśayat, 51 kaḥ āsīt sa svargasya gāyaka-śilpī.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
55 e vidi le sue luci tanto mere, 56 tanto gioconde, che la sua sembianza 57 vinceva li altri e l’ultimo solere.

query.prompt:

query.result: 58 Evaṃ ca, adhikaṃ ratiṃ jñātum 59 śubhaṃ kurvan, naraḥ dine dine 60 paśyati yathā tasya guṇaḥ vardhate,

91 ‘DILIGITE IUSTITIAM’, primai 92 fur verbo e nome di tutto ’l dipinto; 93 ‘QUI IUDICATIS TERRAM’, fur sezzai.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
109 Quei che dipinge lì, non ha chi ’l guidi; 110 ma esso guida, e da lui si rammenta 111 quella virtù ch’è forma per li nidi.
query.error: **English:** 109 He who paints there has no one to guide him; 110 but he guides himself, and from himself he recalls 111 that virtue which is the mold for the nests.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
112 L’altra bëatitudo, che contenta 113 pareva prima d’ingigliarsi a l’emme, 114 con poco moto seguitò la ’mprenta.
query.error: **English:** 112 The other blessedness, which seemed content 113 before it became enamored of the M, 114 with little movement followed the imprint.
query.result: 112 Aparā ca ānandamayī, yā pūrvaṃ 113 M-kāra-yogāt pūrvaṃ santuṣṭāiva ābhāt, 114 alpācalena padacihnam anugacchat.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
115 O dolce stella, quali e quante gemme 116 mi dimostraro che nostra giustizia 117 effetto sia del ciel che tu ingemme!
query.error: **English:** 115 O sweet star, what and how many gems 116 did you show me, that our justice 117 is the effect of the heaven that you adorn!
query.result: 115 He madhura nakṣatra, kimāni ratnāni ca katimāni 116 mayā dṛṣṭāni, yāni darśayanti sma asmākam nyāyam 117 tava tejobhir alamkṛtasya nabhasaḥ phalam iti!

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
118 Per ch’io prego la mente in che s’inizia 119 tuo moto e tua virtute, che rimiri 120 ond’ esce il fummo che ’l tuo raggio vizia;
query.error: **English:** 118 Therefore I pray to the mind in which begins 119 your motion and your virtue, that you look 120 from where the smoke comes that obscures your ray;

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
121 sì ch’un’altra fïata omai s’adiri 122 del comperare e vender dentro al templo 123 che si murò di segni e di martìri.
query.error: **English:** 121 so that once again you may be angered 122 by the buying and selling within the temple 123 that was walled with signs and with martyrdoms.
query.result: 121 yathā punaḥ kadācit tvam kopase bhaveḥ 122 krayavikrayayoḥ nimittam devalaye antaḥ, 123 yaḥ samāveṣṭitaḥ āsīt lakṣaṇaiḥ saha ca śahadatribhiḥ saha ca.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
124 O milizia del ciel cu’ io contemplo, 125 adora per color che sono in terra 126 tutti svïati dietro al malo essemplo!
query.error: **English:** 124 O heavenly host that I behold, 125 pray for those who are on earth, 126 all the saints who follow the evil example!
query.result: 124 He svargasainyāḥ yān aham paśyāmi, 125 pūjayata teṣāṃ nimittam ye pṛthivyām santi, 126 sarve sādhūn duṣṭaṃ ādarśaṃ anudhatte!

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.

query.error: **English:** 127 War used to be waged with swords; 128 but now it is waged by taking away here and there 129 the bread that our merciful Father denies to no one.

query.prompt:

136 ch’io non conosco il pescator né Polo».
